__comments.handles: List of X/Twitter handles to monitor
__comments.quantifier_threshold: Score (0-100) required to consider a post relevant for replies
__comments.emojis_enabled: Whether to include emojis in AI-generated drafts
__comments.reply_to_replies: If true, the bot will also reply to people replying to the target handles
__comments.reply_to_reposts: If true, the bot will draft replies for retweets/reposts (default: false)
__comments.ignore_pinned: Whether to skip posts that are pinned at the top of a profile
__comments.reply_latency_minutes: Minutes to wait before drafting a reply to ensure natural timing
__comments.qualify_age_limit_hours: Max age of a post (in hours) to be considered for a reply
__comments.check_previous_replies: Prevents double-replying to the same post
__comments.headless_browser: If true, browsers run in the background without a window
__comments.gui_refresh_seconds: How often the Feed GUI web page auto-refreshes (default 300s)
__comments.test_mode: If true, uses mock AI responses instead of calling Gemini API (saves tokens)
__comments.engagement_model: Model specifically used for drafting engagement replies (interactions)
__comments.ai_models: Dictionary of available models and their costs per 1k input/output tokens
__comments.nitter_mirrors: List of fallback Nitter URLs for scraping without login
__comments.browser_timeout_seconds: Timeout for page loads in the scraper
__comments.verification_wait_seconds: Time to wait for Cloudflare/Verifying challenges
__comments.x_dot_com_timeout_seconds: Specific timeout for X.com which can be slow
__comments.use_browser_replier: If true, replies are posted via browser rather than API
__comments.scrape_with_replies: Whether to scrape the 'Posts & Replies' tab (captures mentions/threads)
__comments.x_dot_com_base_url: The entry point for X.com (usually https://x.com)
__comments.workflow_mode: 'draft' (save to file) or 'post' (ready to be posted)
__comments.browser_user_data_dir: Where terminal sessions and cookies are stored locally
__comments.last_successful_source: The source that worked best in the previous run (prioritized)
__comments.last_successful_nitter_mirror: The specific Nitter mirror that worked last
__comments.engagement_enabled: Enables/Disables monitoring of replies to your own posts
__comments.engagement_mode: 'assess only' (log only) or 'reply' (draft replies to interactions)
__comments.twitter_handle: The user's own X/Twitter handle for engagement monitoring
__comments.nostr_enabled: Whether to also post replies to Nostr
__comments.nostr_relays: List of Nostr relays to broadcast to
__comments.nostr_screenshot_enabled: Whether to capture and include X post screenshots on Nostr
